description: [WIREFIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1115) is a web shell that can download files to and execute arbitrary commands from compromised Ivanti Connect Secure VPNs.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)

external_references.description: McLellan, T. et al. (2024, January 12). Cutting Edge: Suspected APT Targets Ivanti Connect Secure VPN in New Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
